name: Tower Stack (itch) (Llewellyn Games)
description: Build your tower before everyone else does in Tower Stack.  Every round, draw from the deck a segment of your tower that has a random number on it.  Stack your tower from highest value on the bottom to smallest value on top to win.  Be quick and be careful, you're opponents are doing the same and will sabotage your tower when possible.  Be the first to build your tower to win!
